title: What was the first Jackson 5 song to hit the number one spot on the US Billboard Hot 100? - Quora

response.answer_text: The Jackson 5 had their first four songs in a row that hit #1 in 1970 when they arrived on the scene! “I Want You Back” was their very 1st #1 hit. “ABC” was their 2nd #1 song. “The Love You Save” & that was followed by “I’ll Be There” hit #1 as the groups’ fourth single.
